history.proof: split. - destruct heapPCM as [pf heapPCM1]. hauto lq: on depth: 3. - intros [b [pf H1]]. split. + hauto lq: on depth: 3use: ss_safe_this, ss_step, ss_safe_in. + hauto lq: on depth: 3use: ss_safe_this, ss_step, ss_safe_in.

exceptions.exn: The reference H was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros H. split. - destruct H as [pf H1]. exists (ss_step pf), pf. apply H1. - intros [b [pf H1]]. split. + apply ss_safe_this in H1. apply ss_safe_in in H1. apply H1. + exists b, pf. apply H1.
